snippet.title: ART IS RIFLE - Official Wishlist Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2486730/ART_IS_RIFLE/
WISHLIST NOW on Epic Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/art-is-rifle-897224

ART IS RIFLE is an open-world, FPS puzzle game with rhythmic bullets and psychedelic art styles. Powered by Unreal Engine 5 and much passion.

Official Discord: https://discord.gg/EmStxWP78e
Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/ArtIsRifle
Official Website: https://www.codepsyche.net/

ART IS RIFLE - Official Wishlist Trailer
#indiegame #videogames #indiegamedev #indiegames #unrealengine #ue5 #psychedelicartwork #psychedelicart #drums #drummer #music
